thread.title: Nicki Minaj Clowns Remy Ma's Sales In Response To "ShETHER" Diss
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj Clowns Remy Ma's Sales In Response To "ShETHER" Diss

author: Trevor Smith
title: Nicki Minaj Clowns Remy Ma's Sales In Response To "ShETHER" Diss
text:
Home > Music > Nicki Minaj Clowns Remy Ma's Sales In Response To "ShETHER" Diss Nicki Minaj Clowns Remy Ma's Sales In Response To "ShETHER" Diss 13 37 Posted by Trevor Smith , Feb 25, 2017 at 03:03pm Minaj cites Beyoncé and sales figures to claim superiority over Remy. 
Remy Ma came at Nicki Minaj on a ruthlessly personal diss track today, and it did not go unnoticed by its target. While it seems inevitable that Nicki will share a response on record to Ma's "ShETHER" eventually, her immediate impulse was to have a laugh at the first week sales of Remy's Plata O Plomo album with Fat Joe . A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Feb 25, 2017 at 10:33am PST 
To refute Remy's claim that Nicki can't be the "queen of rap," Minaj produced receipts of Beyoncé calling her just that. Is the Bey co-sign enough to support Nicki's crown or does she have to defend it in a diss track of her own? A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Feb 25, 2017 at 10:58am PST 
If Nicki has a diss track coming, she can start with some rebuttals to these ruthlessly personal lines from Remy's diss . Listen to "ShETHER" here .
